title: IntelliJ classpath doesn't include phonetic and morfologik resources/ directories
description: The .iml files generated by 'ant idea' for the phonetic and morfologik modules don't include src/resources as source paths.  This means that the FilterFactory classes defined in these modules are not loaded by the lucene SPILoader, and consequently the example Solr instance used by various tests does not start.

comments.content: Patch adding sourceFolder directives for morfologik and phonetic.  I think these are the only two problem modules.
comments.author: Alan Woodward

comments.content:
+1

I checked the IDEA module config for all modules with src/resources/, and only these two need fixing.

I'll commit shortly.
